ygData.messageBody:
Greetings Scaled one..
I am Sthiel of the 26th Level, Currently hunting Sarnak in The Overthere. On
what server do Ye reside?

-----Original Message-----
From: Brenton [mailto:bwmcgehee@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 09, 2000 8:14 AM
To: shadowknight@egroups.com
Subject: [shadowknight] shadowknight


Greetings, I am Batleth, an 8th level slayer for the powers of evil. I am
an Iksar and I sever my god by devouring my enemies.

****

Looking for tips and hunting grounds for Iksar ShadowKnights.

Bat'leth
